SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities
